      • canMergeSlot

        public boolean canMergeSlot(ItemStack stack,
                            Slot slotIn)
        Called to determine if the current slot is valid for the stack merging (double-click) code. The stack passed in is null for the initial slot that was double-clicked.
        オーバーライド:
        canMergeSlot クラス内 Container

      • transferStackInSlot

        public ItemStack transferStackInSlot(PlayerEntity playerIn,
                                     int index)
        Handle when the stack in slot index is shift-clicked. Normally this moves the stack between the player inventory and the other inventory(s).
        オーバーライド:
        transferStackInSlot クラス内 Container
